title: Human Resources Interview
Interview Descriptions:
The interview process was great. The environment was cordial and questions were good. 
The questions asked there were of medium difficulty.
The interviewer had good amount of knowledge.
Overall it seemed like a great working place. Looking forward to working there someday

title: Community Supports Mentor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at MOKA (Grand Rapids, MI) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: I was asked to come in for an in-person interview. Two supervisors interviewed me, and they took turns asking several questions. It was a very comfortable environment that had room for open discussion.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you experienced conflict within the workplace.

title: Residential Support Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at MOKA (Grand Rapids, MI)
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward interview process. What-if type questions that give you hypothesis to deal with. Be honest and objective. There are no wrong answers just an assessment of your characteristics given different circumstances.
Interview Questions: How did you handle a coworker that was obviously breaking the rules at your work.

title: Residential Support Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at MOKA in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: You go to the main office and meet up with a few people, it's super relaxed, they try and get to know you as a person. They ask you about your education, past employment, where you want to work in the area.
Interview Questions: they will ask you the most basic interview questions, try and see if you are a good, caring human.
